  • Classes in com.comp2042.logic.movement used by com.comp2042.logic.board
    Class
    Description
    ClearRow
    Represents the result of clearing rows on the game board, including the number of lines removed, the new board matrix, any score bonus, and the indices of the cleared rows.
  • Classes in com.comp2042.logic.movement used by com.comp2042.logic.movement
    Class
    Description
    ClearRow
    Represents the result of clearing rows on the game board, including the number of lines removed, the new board matrix, any score bonus, and the indices of the cleared rows.
    Command
    The Command interface for encapsulating game actions.
    DownData
    Represents the data returned after a brick moves down, including information about any cleared rows and the updated view data.
    EventSource
    Defines the source of a game event, either from user input or an automated thread.
    EventType
    Defines the types of movement events that can occur in the game.
    MoveEvent
    Represents a movement event in the game, encapsulating the type of event and its source (user input or automated process).
